generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity Stay Near Noteblock Behavior
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: The entity will attempt to toss the items from its inventory to a nearby recently played noteblock.

fields.title: Listen Time
fields.description: Sets the time an entity should stay near a noteblock after hearing it.

fields.title: Speed
fields.description: Sets the entity's speed when moving toward the block.

fields.title: Start Distance
fields.description: Sets the distance the entity needs to be away from the block to attempt to start the goal.

fields.title: Stop Distance
fields.description: Sets the distance from the block the entity will attempt to reach.
